  • Instant Updates: Room status and screen sharing now update instantly.
  • Rock-Solid Calls: Improved connection reliability, even on strict networks.
  • Auto-Reconnect: Calls now automatically recover from network blips.
  • No More Stuck Rooms: Fixed issues where users could get stuck in rooms after cancelling calls or network reconnects.

ðŸŽ¬ Better Screen Share Preview

  • Compact Design: Screen share preview is now a clean popover that doesn't take over your entire screen.
  • Multi-Task Friendly: You can chat and react while someone is sharing - everything works together seamlessly.
  • Quick Actions: Easily minimize to bubble or switch to fullscreen grid view with icon buttons.
